verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: There burns a fire with sacred hearts

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: White hot with holy flame

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines: And all who dare pass through its blaze

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines: Will not emerge the same

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines: Some as bronze and some as silver

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines: Some as gold then with great skill

verse.name: v1g
verse.lines: All are hammered by their sufferings

verse.name: v1h
verse.lines: On the anvil of His will

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines: The refiner's fire has now become my soul desire

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: Purged and cleanse and purified

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines: That the Lord be glorified

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines: He is consuming my soul

verse.name: c1e
verse.lines: Refining me making me whole

verse.name: c1f
verse.lines: No matter what I may loose

verse.name: c1g
verse.lines: I choose the refiner's fire

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines: I'm learning now to trust His touch

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: To crave the fire's embrace

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines: For though my past with sin was watch

verse.name: v2d
verse.lines: His mercies did erase

verse.name: v2e
verse.lines: Each time His purging cleanse deeper

verse.name: v2f
verse.lines: I'm not sure that I'll survive

verse.name: v2g
verse.lines: Yet the strength in growing weaker

verse.name: v2h
verse.lines: Keeps my hungry soul alive
